e affected by cyclic neutropenia ?,Cyclic neutropenia is a rare condition and is estimated to occur in 1 in 1 million individuals worldwide.,GHR,cyclic neutropenia
What are the genetic changes related to cyclic neutropenia ?,"Mutations in the ELANE gene cause cyclic neutropenia. The ELANE gene provides instructions for making a protein called neutrophil elastase, which is found in neutrophils. When the body starts an immune response to fight an infection, neutrophils release neutrophil elastase.
